version_description:
This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

- Portrait / Landscape orientation
- 4 new types of Daily Events
- MFi controller, Tilt, iCade support
- custom Graphics Quality, Buttons Layout
- fixed graphics issues, popping sounds, mission score and objectives
- own music/podcast is not turned off
